summary: Automates the generation of source files for fast multi‑head attention (FMHA) kernels targeting HIP GPUs by populating predefined templates with specific data types, flags, and configuration options, producing forward, backward, inference, and reference kernel instances.
business_intent: To streamline the creation and maintenance of high‑performance attention kernels for HIP‑enabled hardware, enabling rapid production of multiple kernel variants with different configurations while reducing manual coding effort and potential errors.
